snippet: The founder of Amazon.com is buying The Washington Post for $250 million in cash. | Sony plans to keep all of its entertainment arm, rejecting a proposal by an investor. | European banks appear to be deferring more banker pay than their American...
abstract: The founder of Amazon.com is buying The Washington Post for $250 million in cash. | Sony plans to keep all of its entertainment arm, rejecting a proposal by an investor. | European banks appear to be deferring more banker pay than their American counterparts. | New York State’s financial regulator is cracking down on high-interest lending.

headline.main: Bezos Buys a Landmark in Washington
